data.text:
@ValVenisEnt Sure thing. Still not related to vaccines.

Still waiting for you to put up since you didn't shut up. So proof of the "gene therapy hoax" please?
@MPJDK Oh boy. You should double up on your gene therapy

@ValVenisEnt and mRNA does not alter your DNA in any way. So please do provide some actual proof for the "Gene therapy hoax" claim.

Or stop making the claim

@ValVenisEnt sure that totally legitimizes the "hoax" claim, or maybe it opens the door for people who don't understand science to think that this will give us bat wings or x-ray vision like an X-Man.

Calm down scooter, it shouldn't upset you this much to do what you ask others to do.
@MPJDK Dude, IT FUCKING DESCRIBES WHAT THE FUCK MRNA IS AND HOW IT WORKS DIRECTLY ON MODERNAS WEBSITE -> https://t.co/uj7yGNJBp9
@MPJDK Dude, IT FUCKING DESCRIBES WHAT THE FUCK MRNA IS AND HOW IT WORKS DIRECTLY ON MODERNAS WEBSITE -> https://t.co/YKc2tzUevL
@ValVenisEnt Sorry, I do not see any sources backing up your gene therapy hoax claim originally made - so wtf is the matter with you since you started out with unsubstantiated claims

@MPJDK Dude, again, i repeat.... COVID VACCINE IS NOT FDA APPROVED! WHY DO WE HAVE THE FDA WHEN POLITICIANS CAN JUST APPROVE ANYTHING THEY WANT??? 

I ask RELEVANT QUESTIONS and you come out here like I making claims. Wtf is the matter with you?

@ValVenisEnt Okay at this point just admit you don't know anything about the process to get it approved for emergency use.

It is okay, not everyone does - but then again not everyone opens their mouth and proves that they don't know what they are talking about but you bravely went there.
@MPJDK Were you born stupid or is this a recent development? If there was "rigorous study" as you CLAIM, THERE WOULD BE FDA APPROVAL INSTEAD OF POLITICIANS EMERGENCY APPROVAL! Smdh

@ValVenisEnt And please do provide scientific proof for it being a "gene therapy scam disguised as a vaccine"

Since you're all about the facts and you made the original claim, please back it up.

@ValVenisEnt You obviously do not know what it took to get these vaccines cleared to be used, you talk like someone pissed in a vial and called it a vaccine and then it gets put in someone's arm.

the fact that they got authorization to use is the supporting fact for rigorous scientific study

@MPJDK Dude, do you understand what supporting facts are? You & lord Fauci keep making CLAIMS and FAIL at every turn to PROVE those CLAIMS true with SUPPORTING FACTS! It might be a really good idea to NOT make futher CLAIMS without SUPPORTING FACTS. Just my advice. Its a freebie

@ValVenisEnt No proof will ever be enough for those who won't listen. So do carry on supporting the more lethal option

Like a real humanitarian.

@MPJDK Sooooooo...... because you say so or because Forbes says so or do you or the author on Forbes have SUPPORTING EVIDENCE for the NUMEROUS CLAIMS you are trying to pass off as "facts" proving PREVIOUS CLAIMS?

@ValVenisEnt Here is one with 3 seconds of googling

https://t.co/X6rwqLSaiL

@MPJDK WOW! I ask for facts proving your claims are true and you just present more CLAIMS! WTF is wrong with you dude? If I parrot the CLAIM you are making and then I get asked for SUPPORTING FACTS, saying "@MPJDK said so" is not going to cut the cheese dude. Facts please!

@ValVenisEnt Plenty of examples worldwide, other than "it has not received final approval" do you have? they have passed every scientific evaluation it's been put through worldwide and have been given authorization to be used on human beings, first on a trial basis and later on in general.

@MPJDK Cool claim. Got and supporting facts proving your claim true? I am always open to changing my positions. But my positions are based of facts acquired. Not on opinions, assumptions or just because "you say so." Please present your supporting facts proving your claim true.
@ValVenisEnt @JasmineEStokes I don't know how anything you said changes the fact that it's working.
@MPJDK @JasmineEStokes Just curious how anything you just said changes the FACT non of the vaccines have been APPROVED???
@ValVenisEnt Fauckchi need to visit the gallows

@ValVenisEnt @JasmineEStokes Yeah there was no evaluations, no trials no scrutiny or approvals to distribute them. It is just a dirty "big pharma" ex-taco truck driving around the country illegally giving people injections.

Go back to talking about dicks instead of being one.
@ValVenisEnt I’m tired of holding my tongue man. It gets exhausting.

@ValVenisEnt They’re doing everything they can to keep us from getting together. When people get together, they talk, they learn things, they realize things, and they begin fighting back. That’s what I think this is what this bs has been about
@ValVenisEnt I refuse to be a fucking lab rat
@ValVenisEnt These are the questions...
